Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to protect the integrity of transmitted information
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Firewall segmentation in place but integrity protection mechanisms (e.g., digital signatures) not documented

Requirement Description: Use cryptographic mechanisms to protect message integrity
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of cryptographic message integrity protection (e.g., HMAC, IPsec)

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to detect, report and protect against malicious code
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Antivirus scanning tested on VMs (NET-2A-TC203), Veeam backup agents deployed

Requirement Name: Malicious code protection at entry/exit points
Requirement Description: Detect and report malicious code at all entry and exit points
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: AV on VMs but entry/exit point protection (e.g., firewall-based AV) not documented

Requirement Name: Central management for malicious code protection
Requirement Description: Centrally manage malicious code protection mechanisms
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: AV present but centralized management not explicitly documented

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to perform security functionality verification
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Testing covers operational verification but automated security function verification not documented

Requirement Description: Automated notification of failed security verification tests
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS monitoring in place but automated security verification not explicitly documented

Requirement Name: Security functionality verification during normal operation
Requirement Description: Perform security functionality verification during normal operation
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of continuous security function verification during operations

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to detect and protect against unauthorized changes to software and information
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Backup integrity testing (NET-2A-TC206) but software integrity monitoring not explicitly documented

Requirement Description: Automated notification of integrity violations
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS alerts configured for backup failures and system events

Requirement Description: Automated response to integrity violations
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Alerting present but automated response actions not documented

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to validate inputs
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Not explicitly addressed in test specification

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to fail to a predetermined state in the event of an operational failure
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Fail-safe testing with firewall and switch failures showing graceful degradation (NET-2A-TC201A/B)

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to handle errors in a manner such that the system remains in a secure state
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: System recovery and reconstitution tested (NET-2A-TC201A/B/C)

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to protect the integrity of communications sessions
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Not explicitly addressed in test specification

Requirement Description: Invalidate session identifiers upon session termination
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Not explicitly addressed in test specification

Requirement Description: Generate unique session identifiers with definable entropy
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of session ID randomization mechanisms

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to protect audit information and audit tools from unauthorized access
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: LibreNMS stores audit data but protection mechanisms not detailed

Requirement Description: Hardware write-once capability or write-protected media for audit records
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of write-once or write-protected media for audit logs

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to support system updates
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Firmware upgrade testing planned (NET-2A-TC201A, NET-2A-TC201B)

Requirement Description: Verify authenticity and integrity of updates
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: Update process tested but authenticity/integrity verification not documented

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to detect and protect against physical tampering
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of physical tampering detection mechanisms

Requirement Name: Provisioning product supplier roots of trust
Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to provision product supplier roots of trust
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of vendor root of trust provisioning

Requirement Name: Provisioning asset owner roots of trust
Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to provision asset owner roots of trust
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of asset owner root of trust provisioning

Requirement Description: The control system shall provide the capability to verify the integrity of the boot process
Evidence from TVCS SAT Document: No evidence of secure boot or boot integrity verification
